channel.title: Living Room on
channel.description: Recent content in Living Room on

item.title: blu ray player
item.description: blu ray player # find the denon remote, and press blu-ray. find the panasonic remote and turn on the player. movies # movies are in the den closet, in alphabetical order.

item.title: tv
item.description: apple tv # if you push any button on the apple tv it should turn everything on. hold down the power button on the top right of that remote to turn everything off. other remotes # other remotes are in the drawer on the left side of the tv console. lights behind the tv # the lights behind the tv are powered by usb from the tv. they turn on anytime the tv gives power to that port, which is very random.
